Class Backend

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs213.photoAlbum.model.Backend
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BackendInterface

    public class Backend
extends java.lang.Object
implements BackendInterface
    Backend class for interacting with file system and storing data for session persistence. Implements BackendInterface
    Author:
    Ananth Rao, Allon Fineziber
